subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Saturday’s outing proved Jenrry Mejia is still an unfinished product as he unraveled in the sixth inning, giving up five earned runs and relinquishing the Mets’ 5-1 lead.
snippet: Saturday’s outing proved Jenrry Mejia is still an unfinished product as he unraveled in the sixth inning, giving up five earned runs and relinquishing the Mets’ 5-1 lead.
